_header: Was never in Scotland heard nor seen
_description: Attributed to King James I — 23 x 9-line stanzas, ababbcbcd including refr. ‘At chrystis kirk on the grene’

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Was never in scotland hard nor seneSic dansing nor
                    deray…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…ffor he durst stryk na vtherAt chrystis kirk on the
                    grene
CamMagPep2553.Editions:
Craigie,  William Alexander. 
             The Maitland Folio Manuscript, Containing Poems by Sir Richard
                Maitland, Dunbar, Douglas, Henryson, and others.
             2 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         n.s. 7 (1919), 20 (1927); Edinburgh and London: Blackwood, 1919,
            1927: 1.149-55.

Banna.First Lines:
Was nevir in scotland hard nor seneSic dansing nor
                    deray…
Banna.Last Lines:
…For he durst ding nane vdir for feirAt chryst kirk of the
                    Grene þat day
Banna.Attributed Author: ffinis quod king Iames the first (f. 101)
